text: Christopher Douglas Roney (born December 15, 1969), known by the stage name Cool C, is an American rapper. He is known today for killing a Philadelphia police officer in a bank robbery in January 1996. He is currently at the Pennsylvania state prison awaiting execution. He was to have been put to death by lethal injection on March 9, 2006, but his execution was postponed. It was scheduled for January 8, 2015 before being postponed in December 2014 by a court order. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Rappers from Pennsylvania Category:American murderers Category:Musicians from Philadelphia
title: Cool C
